thread.title: MCS Live Podcast Episode 4: Mike McMahon of The Mack Report
thread.title_full: MCS Live Podcast Episode 4: Mike McMahon of The Mack Report

author: Justin Soderberg
title: MCS Live Podcast Episode 4: Mike McMahon of The Mack Report
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
MCS Live is back on MillCitySports.com with another MCS Live Podcast featuring host Justin Soderberg . 
On episode 4 of the podcast I chatted with Mike McMahon , Editor of The Mack Report and Senior Writer for College Hockey News . We talked about the upcoming home-and-home series between the UMass Lowell River Hawks and Merrimack College Warriors. 
The first game gets underway on Friday, October 23 at Lawler Arena in North Andover, Massachusetts. Puck drops at 7:00 p.m. eastern. The two schools will head to Lowell on Saturday, October SHARE
